title.rendered: Mission #002: A Life of No Regrets

content.rendered:
Mission #002: A Life of No Regrets
Start Location Dehara City, Cloud Game Corner – old man in northwest corner
Unlock Requirements
  • Completed main story missions up until Dehara City
Objectives Play Cloud Burst in the Game Corner and collect 3000 Coins in a single day
Reward Pokémon: Balloon Pikachu (Electric-type)

An old man in the Cloud Game Corner has a mission for you – play enough of one particular minigame to earn 3000 Coins, and he’ll give you a Flying Pikachu.

Starting the Mission

The Cloud Game Corner is above the Department Store and the Pokémon Center in Dehara City. Speak to the man outside and he’ll give you a Coin Case, which is essential to playing any games within.

Speak to the old man in the northwest corner to receive the mission – you’ll need to earn 3000 Coins today playing Cloud Burst, the new Game Corner minigame introduced in Pokémon Unbound.

How to Complete

Cloud Burst is a minigame where you control an Altaria, flying around popping balloons. It will take quite a few runs for you to rack up 3000 points, but it is doable.

The red balloons provide a low amount of points, the striped balloons provide a high amount, the spiked balloons reduce your points and the green orbs double them for a short period.

The amount of points you have at the end of the game is the amount of Coins you earn.

There are three difficulties, Easy, Medium, and Hard, and the amount of points you earn depends on them:

Difficulty Differences
Easy Medium Hard
Cost per Game 5 Coins 10 Coins 15 Coins
Time Limit 90 seconds 60 seconds 45 seconds
Red Balloon +1 point +1 point +1 point
Striped Balloon +3 points +5 points +7 points
Spiked Balloon -2 points -5 points -7 points

Use the directional buttons to fly the Altaria around and pop each balloon. You’ve got a limited amount of time, depending on difficulty.

If you manage to earn 3000 Coins in a single day, speak to the old man: he’ll give you a Balloon Pikachu with Levitate and the moves Fly, Agility, Slam, and Discharge.
